'''My Precious''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Domains and Spiral Abyss: Series I]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete [[Spiral Abyss]] 2–2 with an undamaged [[Ley Line Monolith]].

==Trivia==
* The name of the achievement is a reference to {{w|Gollum}} from {{w|J. R. R. Tolkien}}'s ''{{w|The Lord of the Rings}}'', who famously referred to the One Ring as "my precious."
